headline: Well-Known Investor Has Bought Meta (META), Chipotle (CMG)
summary: Prominent investor Stephanie Link noted on CNBC today that she had recently bought Meta (META) and Chipotle (CMG). Link, the Chief Investment Strategist of Hightower Advisors, suggested that, for long-term investors, now is “a decent time to buy” stocks. Why Link Bought Chipotle and Meta Down 29% from its high, CMG has said that it […]

headline: Chipotle settles EEOC lawsuit alleging supervisor yanked Muslim employee’s hijab
summary: Under the consent decree, Chipotle must pay $20,000 and emphasize workplace dignity and respect in court-mandated training for employees at eight Kansas restaurants.

raw.headline: Chipotle settles EEOC lawsuit alleging supervisor yanked Muslim employee’s hijab
